definitions.text: an artistic form of nonverbal communication
a party of people assembled for dancing
taking a series of rhythmical steps (and movements) in time to music
move in a graceful and rhythmical way
examples: The young girl danced into the room

definitions.text: move in a pattern; usually to musical accompaniment; do or perform a dance
examples: My husband and I like to dance at home to the radio

definitions.text: skip, leap, or move up and down or sideways
